vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.17
§ Azur or Azzur = "he that assists"
1) a Benjamite of Gibeon, father of the false prophet Hananiah
2) father of Jaazaniah, one of the princes against whom Ezekiel was commanded to prophecy
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
押朔 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他幫助"
1) 基遍的便雅憫人, 假先知哈拿尼雅的父親 ( # 耶 28:1| )
2) 雅撒尼亞的父親, 他是被以西結受感而說預言攻擊的人之 ( #結 11:1| )
3) 以色列被擄歸回的一名首長 (尼 10:17| )
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
押朔 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他帮助"
1) 基遍的便雅悯人, 假先知哈拿尼雅的父亲 ( # 耶 28:1| )
2) 雅撒尼亚的父亲, 他是被以西结受感而说预言攻击的人之 ( #结 11:1| )
3) 以色列被掳归回的一名首长 (尼 10:17| )

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.28.1;
father of: Hananiah (H2608A)
§ Azur or Azzur = "he that assists"
1) a Benjamite of Gibeon, father of the false prophet Hananiah
2) father of Jaazaniah, one of the princes against whom Ezekiel was commanded to prophecy

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezk.11.1;
father of: Jaazaniah (H2970I)
§ Azur or Azzur = "he that assists"
1) a Benjamite of Gibeon, father of the false prophet Hananiah
2) father of Jaazaniah, one of the princes against whom Ezekiel was commanded to prophecy
